item.title: Tropical Storm Melissa may strengthen to hurricane: Latest forecast
item.description: Tropical Storm Melissa has formed in the Atlantic and may further strengthen into a hurricane.

item.title: Person arrested after driving into barricade near White House: Secret Service
item.description: A person has been arrested after driving his car into a security gate near the White House on Tuesday night, the U.S. Secret Service said.

item.title: WATCH: Parkinson's disease patient plays clarinet during brain surgery
item.description: A patient undergoing brain surgery plays the clarinet, allowing surgeons to instantly hear the impacts of the treatment.

item.title: WATCH: Parents of Israeli hostage killed by Hamas waiting for his body to be returned
item.description: Omer Neutra from New York state is one of two deceased American Israeli hostages whose bodies have still not been returned by Hamas.

item.title: Trump admin seeks to dissolve remaining order blocking troop deployment to Portland
item.description: The filing comes after an appeals court overturned another order that prevented the Trump administration from deploying the Oregon National Guard to P...
